title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: four woven panels, white with brightly colored geometric design covering all but bottom 5-6\"; sewn together at sides and at two center seams; square neckline cut from front and back and set in with braid and scallop design with side slit and two snaps on one side; multicolor
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
